meanings.definition: Drops of saline fluid that are secreted by the lacrimal glands in response to emotion or irritation.
meanings.sent1: Her tears flowed when she felt sad.
meanings.sent2: I wiped away my tears after watching a touching movie.
meanings.sent3: The clown's fake tears made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The tears of joy streamed down her face at the surprise party.
meanings.sent5: The tears of sorrow left a trail on her cheeks.

meanings.definition: To rip or pull apart by force.
meanings.sent1: He tears the paper when he is angry.
meanings.sent2: The dog tears apart his toys in excitement.
meanings.sent3: The strong wind tears the leaves off the trees.
meanings.sent4: The loud noise tears through the silence of the night.
meanings.sent5: She tears the fabric to make it into a new design.

meanings.sent1: The book tears easily if not handled carefully.
meanings.sent2: The old shirt tears at the seams.
meanings.sent3: The loud music tears through the peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The storm tears down trees in its path.
meanings.sent5: The fragile paper tears with the slightest touch.
